mapper.select: SELECT DISTINCT h.* FROM host h FULL OUTER JOIN blocking b ON(h.id = b.host_id) WHERE (NOT b.blocking_date BETWEEN TO_DATE(#{sStartDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') AND TO_DATE(#{sEndDate},'MM/DD/YYYY') OR b.blocking_date IS NULL) AND (h.latitude BETWEEN #{swLatitude} AND #{neLatitude}) AND (h.longitude BETWEEN #{swLongitude} AND #{neLongitude}) AND h.capacity >= #{capacity} ORDER BY h.id
